    • isClosed

      public boolean isClosed()
      Description copied from interface: Server
      Returns true if Server.close() has been called. Once closed a new MPD will need to be created. Automatic reconnections will not be attempted after close is called.
      Specified by:
      isClosed in interface Server
      Returns:
      true if Server.close() has been called
